item.title: autoupgrade

item.title: blockwishlist
item.description: Known bugs (1 campaigns / 2 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/03_frontOffice/02_products/01_addProductToList.spec.ts : hummingbird#908 : [2.0 Beta] The quantity is not saved when you save a product in a wishlist PrestaShop#36496 : Page “My wishlists” - Sort “Last added” doesn’t work
